home.heroDescription: Exceptional wines, refined cuisine, in the heart of Luxembourg's most enchanting quarter.
home.introText: Nestled along the Alzette River in Luxembourg's historic Grund quarter, Vins Fins is a haven for wine lovers. Our carefully curated cellar celebrates terroir-driven wines from passionate artisan producers, complemented by seasonal cuisine crafted with the finest local ingredients.
home.menuDesc: Seasonal French-inspired cuisine designed to complement our wines perfectly.
home.shopDesc: Take the experience home. Browse our selection of wines available for delivery.
home.ctaDesc: Reserve your table and let us craft a memorable wine and dining experience for you.

menuPage.menuNote: All prices include VAT. Please inform us of any allergies or dietary requirements. Our team is happy to suggest wine pairings for every dish.

shop.heroDesc: Our curated selection of wines, available for delivery across Luxembourg.

about.passionTitle: A Passion Born in the Cellar
about.passionP1: Vins Fins was born from a simple belief: that great wine should be accessible, enjoyable, and shared with warmth. Nestled in the cobblestoned streets of Luxembourg's Grund neighborhood, our wine bar is a sanctuary for those who appreciate the craft of winemaking.
about.passionP2: What began as a small cave √† vin has grown into a beloved gathering place where locals and travelers alike come to discover wines that tell stories of their terroir, their makers, and the seasons that shaped them.
about.passionP3: Every bottle on our list has been personally selected, every dish on our menu thoughtfully crafted to enhance the wine experience. We believe dining should be a journey ‚Äî not just a meal.
about.philoP1: We champion wines made with minimal intervention ‚Äî wines that speak of place rather than process. Our cellar favors organic and biodynamic producers who work in harmony with nature.
about.philoP2: From the sun-drenched vineyards of Provence to the steep slopes of the Northern Rh√¥ne, from the chalky soils of Champagne to the volcanic terroirs of Beaujolais ‚Äî we seek wines with soul.
about.philoP3: We also proudly feature Luxembourg's own Moselle wines, supporting local vignerons who produce world-class Rieslings, Pinot Blancs, and Cr√©mants that deserve far more recognition.
about.marcBio: Former head sommelier at a Michelin-starred restaurant in Paris, Marc brought his passion for natural wines to Luxembourg.
about.sophieBio: Classically trained in Lyon, Sophie creates seasonal menus that celebrate local produce and complement our wine selection.
about.thomasBio: With deep roots in Luxembourg's wine scene, Thomas travels the vineyards of Europe to source our finest bottles.
about.valuesNaturalDesc: We prioritize wines made with respect for the environment and minimal intervention.
about.valuesCommunityDesc: We're more than a bar ‚Äî we're a gathering place for wine lovers and friends.
about.valuesTerroirDesc: Every wine tells the story of its land. We celebrate diversity of place and grape.
about.ctaDesc: We'd love to welcome you. Book a table or simply stop by for a glass.

contact.gettingHereText: Street parking along Rue M√ºnster. Nearest car park: Parking du Grund (5 min walk). The free Grund elevator connects from Plateau du Saint-Esprit.
contact.reserveDesc: Book online via our reservation system or call us directly.
contact.zenchefNote: In production, the Zenchef booking widget would be embedded here.

footer.brandDesc: Wine bar & restaurant in the heart of Luxembourg's historic Grund neighborhood. Curated wines, inspired cuisine, unforgettable moments.
footer.newsletterDesc: Wine events, new arrivals, and exclusive offers.

cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.
